name: Yvette and the spirit of fox
name_original: Yvette and the spirit of fox
description:
This demo version only has 1 playable level, its very early prototype, and has some bugs!

Feel free to leave your opinions, because it will help us to add more stuff, polish the game and much more..

Controls:

WASD - To move

Space - Jump/Double Jump

Shift - Shoot bow
